name: Coin
description: The primary currency of Tyria. Spent at vendors throughout the world.

name: Karma
description: Earned through various activities. Spent at vendors throughout the world.

name: Laurel
description: Earned through the Log-in Reward Chest. Spent in major cities. Used to purchase various rewards.

name: Gem
description: Purchased and spent via the Black Lion Trading Company.

name: Ascalonian Tear
description: Earned in Ascalonian Catacombs. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Ascalon" component used in creating legendary weapons.

name: Shard of Zhaitan
description: Earned in the Ruined City of Arah. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Zhaitan" component used in creating legendary weapons.

name: Fractal Relic
description: Earned and spent in Fractals of the Mists. Also used as a crafting ingredient.

name: Seal of Beetletun
description: Earned in Caudecus's Manor. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of the Nobleman" component used in creating legendary weapons.

name: Manifesto of the Moletariate
description: Earned in Sorrow's Embrace. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of the Forgeman" component used in creating legendary weapons.

name: Deadly Bloom
description: Earned in Twilight Arbor. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Thorns" component used in creating legendary weapons.

name: Symbol of Koda
description: Earned in Honor of the Waves. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of the Sanctuary" component used in creating legendary weapons.

name: Flame Legion Charr Carving
description: Earned in Citadel of Flame. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Baelfire" component used in creating legendary weapons.

name: Knowledge Crystal
description: Earned in Crucible of Eternity. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Knowledge" component used in creating legendary weapons.

name: Badge of Honor
description: Earned and spent in WvW to purchase various items.

name: Guild Commendation
description: Earned through Guild Missions. Spent in Lion's Arch. Used to purchase various rewards.

name: Transmutation Charge
description: Purchased via the Black Lion Trading Company. Spent in the wardrobe to change appearance.

name: Airship Part
description: Earned and spent in Verdant Brink. Train the Itzel Language Mastery ability to trade with Itzel vendors for bladed armor and other goods.

name: Ley Line Crystal
description: Earned and spent in Tangled Depths. Train the Nuhoch Language Mastery ability to trade with Nuhoch vendors for chak weapons and other goods.

name: Lump of Aurillium
description: Earned and spent in Auric Basin. Train the Exalted Acceptance Mastery line to trade with Exalted merchants for auric weapon recipes and other goods.

name: Spirit Shard
description: Used by Miyani to maintain the Mystic Forge.

name: Pristine Fractal Relic
description: Earned and spent in the Fractals of the Mists. Used to purchase ascended rings.

name: Geode
description:
Earned by completing events in Dry Top. Accepted by vendors throughout the area.
Can be traded for valuable items including recipes for foods, Nomad's gear, and ambrite weapons.

name: WvW Skirmish Claim Ticket
description: Earned by participating in WvW skirmishes. Traded for various rewards at a WvW Skirmish Supervisor.

name: Bandit Crest
description:
Earned by completing events in the Silverwastes. Accepted by vendors in Camp Resolve and at secured outposts.
Can be traded for valuable items including Carapace armor and recipes for sinister gear.

name: Magnetite Shard
description: Earned from bosses and events inside Heart of Thorns raids.

name: Provisioner Token
description: Earned by helping Faction Provisioners.

name: PvP League Ticket
description: Earned when crossing division thresholds during PvP league seasons. Spend in the Heart of the Mists and trade for various rewards at the PvP League Vendor.

name: Proof of Heroics
description: Earned when ranking up in World vs World. Spent at any Notary of Heroics in World vs. World to obtain hero points.

name: Unbound Magic
description: Earned from creatures empowered by unbound magic.

name: Ascended Shards of Glory
description: Earned from PvP League Division Chests.

name: Trade Contract
description: Earned in the Crystal Desert. Spend at karma merchants to purchase trade crates with crafting materials, new crafting recipes, and other rewards unique to the Crystal Desert.

name: Elegy Mosaic
description:
Earned by completing legendary bounties in the Crystal Desert. Spend at the Tomb of Primeval Kings.

<c=@Flavor>These markers were used to commemorate great deeds in the Dynastic Era of ancient Elona.</c>

name: Testimony of Heroics
description: Earned when ranking up in World vs World. Spent at any Notary of Heroics in World vs. World to obtain hero points.

name: Exalted Key
description: Used to open Exalted chests in Auric Basin. Chests can contain armor, weapons, and recipes.

name: Machete
description: Used to open noxious pods in Dragon's Stand. Pods can contain armor, weapons, and recipes.

name: Gaeting Crystal
description: Earned from bosses and events inside Path of Fire raids.

name: Bandit Skeleton Key
description: Used to open lost bandit chests in the Silverwastes. Chests can contain armor, weapons, recipes, ambrite, and more.

name: Pact Crowbar
description: Used to open airship cargo in Verdant Brink. Cargo can contain crafting materials, armor, weapons, and recipes.

name: Vial of Chak Acid
description: Used to open crystallized supply caches in Tangled Depths. Caches can contain armor, weapons, and recipes.

name: Zephyrite Lockpick
description: Used to open buried locked chests in Dry Top. These chests are only visible during sandstorms. Chests can contain armor, weapons, rare skins, recipes, ambrite, and more.

name: Trader's Key
description: Used to open trade crates in the Crystal Desert.

name: Volatile Magic
description: Unstable magic lingering from the fall of a god and two Elder Dragons. Spent at vendors to purchase unlocks and rewards.

name: PvP Tournament Voucher
description: Earned in monthly automated tournaments and some special event tournaments.

name: Racing Medallion
description: Earned by participating in roller beetle races and time trials.

name: Mistborn Key
description: Used to open Mistborn Coffers in Dragonfall.

name: Festival Token
description: Earned by participating in the yearly Festival of the Four Winds.
